text:
Martin Joseph "Marty" Walsh (born April 10, 1967) is an American politician. He is the 54th and current Mayor of Boston, Massachusetts since 2014. He was a member of the Massachusetts House of Representatives from 1997 until 2014 and representing the Thirteenth Suffolk district.
On January 7, 2021 President-elect Joe Biden nominated Walsh to be United States Secretary of Labor under his administration.
